specifications: Image sensor: 5M CMOS sensor Display: 1.5 inches TFT LCD Optical: Roof prism Diameter: 25 mm Magnification: 12 x 15 Angle field of view: 5.5° Linear field of view: 96 m/1000 m Exit pupil diameter: 2.08 mm Relative brightness: 4.326 Picture size: 3264 x 2448 (8MP), 2580 x 1936 (5MP), 2048 x 1536 (3MP),1920 x1080 (2MP) HD, 1280 x 1024 (1.3MP), 640 x 480 (VGA) Self-timer: 10 seconds Optical coatings: Reflection reducing coating Memory: 32MB, support expansion up to 32GB I/O: USB jack and SD card Slot Battery: 2 x AA battery (Not included) Product weight: 275 g Package weight: 395 g Product size (L x W x H): 14.0 x 10.5 x 5.5 cm Package size (L x W x H): 15.0 x 13.5 x 8.5 cm
packagecontents: 1 xDT-07 Binoculars with Camera 1 x Clean Cloth 1 x USB Cable 1 x User Manual
mainfeatures: Powerful binoculars combined with the creativity of a digital camera Capture photos of nature, sports, concerts and more Built-in digital camera captures your images Sharp 12 x 15 magnification 8.0 mega pixels, you can capture clear and nice photos of birdwatching/outdoor activities/sporting events and so on Support the function of playback, just enter the preview button to preview LCD display keeps track of photo count Comes with neck strap for your easy and convenient carrying Insert SD card before taking pictures (Not included)
